hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.trackeddocument.report.DocketDocumentReceivalSummary( docket.id, docket.value, court.name, (select count(receival) from omis.trackeddocument.domain.TrackedDocumentReceival as receival where receival.docket = docket ) ) from omis.docket.domain.Docket as docket inner join docket.court court inner join docket.person as person where person = :defendant
